Bemutatas: A ruthless oil prospector in the early 20th century rises to power but at great personal cost.

Bemutatas: Two lighthouse keepers struggle to maintain their sanity on a remote and mysterious island.

Bemutatas: The journey of Paul Atreides continues as he seeks revenge against the forces that destroyed his family, now a part of the mysterious desert planet.
